{"id":986188050,"question_id":2767,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1688481825,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"59 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/986188050/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Sum With Exactly K Elements ","memory":"70.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximizeSum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        \n        int max_val = 0;\n        int sum = 0;\n\n        for(auto i:nums){\n            if(i>max_val){\n                max_val = i;\n            }\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i<k; i++){\n            sum += max_val;\n            max_val += 1;\n        }\n\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-sum-with-exactly-k-elements","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
